p: Last but not least, how will our decisions be affected while initiating treatment for the patients that are newly diagnosed with a rheumatic disease during COVID-19 pandemic? If possible, it may be recommended to test for SARS-CoV-2 before initiating biologics as we do for tuberculosis. However, the exact response to this question remains unknown currently. This issue will also be a hot topic when the pandemic is over since we currently do not know about the possibility of latent disease in COVID-19.
